trans-unit.source: Interactively controls a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" />.
trans-unit.target: Controla interativamente um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" />.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> to interactively begin, pause, resume, seek, skip, stop, and remove a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.
trans-unit.target: Use um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> para interativamente Iniciar, pausar, retomar, busca, ignorar, parar e remover um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.

trans-unit.source: You can only interactively control root-level clocks.
trans-unit.target: Somente interativamente, você pode controlar os relógios de nível raiz.

trans-unit.source: Sets the target <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock" /> to begin at the next tick.
trans-unit.target: Define o destino <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock" /> para começar no próximo tique.

trans-unit.source: This method causes the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> to behave as though its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> object's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> were set to the time of the next tick.
trans-unit.target: Este método faz com que o destino <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> se comporte como se seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> do objeto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> foi definida como a hora do próximo tick.

trans-unit.source: The timeline's actual <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> setting is ignored (but not changed).
trans-unit.target: Real da linha do tempo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> configuração é ignorada (mas não alterar).

trans-unit.source: This method changes the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Active>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método altera o relógio de destino <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Active>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A> method does not resume a paused clock.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A> método não reinicia um relógio em pausa.

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: Este método não tem nenhum efeito na árvore de tempo até a próxima vez que um tique é processado.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events will also not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: Como um efeito colateral, os eventos adequados também não ocorrerá até lá.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Chamar esse método dispara o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> controlled by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> controlado por este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> controlled by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> controlados por este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController" />.

trans-unit.source: Stops the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> from progressing.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe o andamento do destino <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" />.

trans-unit.source: You can pause a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> regardless of its current state, and pausing a clock does not change its current state.
trans-unit.target: Você pode pausar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> , independentemente de seu atual estado e pausar um relógio não altera seu estado atual.

trans-unit.source: A clock can be paused while <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Active>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Stopped>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Filling>.
trans-unit.target: Um relógio pode ser pausado enquanto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Active>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Stopped>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Filling>.

trans-unit.source: The only way to unpause a clock is by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Resume%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A única maneira de retomar um relógio está usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Resume%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Pausing a clock implicitly pauses its children.
trans-unit.target: Pausar um relógio implicitamente pausa seus filhos.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method when the target clock is already paused has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Chamar esse método quando o relógio de destino já está em pausa não tem nenhum efeito.

trans-unit.source: Pausing a clock triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: Pausando gatilhos um relógio de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController" /> from the properties it animates.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController" /> das propriedades que ele anima.

trans-unit.source: The clock and its child clocks will no longer affect these properties.
trans-unit.target: O relógio e seus relógios filho não afetarão mais essas propriedades.

trans-unit.source: This method triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.RemoveRequested> event.
trans-unit.target: Esse método dispara o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.RemoveRequested> evento.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to remove and otherwise interactively control a clock.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como remover e controlar interativamente um relógio.

trans-unit.source: Enables a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was previously paused to resume progressing.
trans-unit.target: Permite a retomada do andamento de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> colocado anteriormente em pausa.

trans-unit.source: You can pause or resume a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> regardless of its current state, and pausing or resuming a clock does not change its current state.
trans-unit.target: Você pode pausar ou retomar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> , independentemente de seu estado atual e para pausar ou retomar um relógio não altera seu estado atual.

trans-unit.source: A clock can be paused while <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Active>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Stopped>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Filling>.
trans-unit.target: Um relógio pode ser pausado enquanto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Active>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Stopped>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Filling>.

trans-unit.source: The only way to resume a paused clock is by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Resume%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: É a única maneira de retomar um relógio pausado usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Resume%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Resuming a clock implicitly resumes its children.
trans-unit.target: A retomada de um relógio implicitamente retoma a seus filhos.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method on a clock that is not paused has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Chamar esse método em um relógio de que não está em pausa não tem nenhum efeito.

trans-unit.source: Resuming a paused clock triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: Retomando um gatilhos de relógio em pausa o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> evento.

trans-unit.source: The seek offset, measured in the target clock's time.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento de busca, medido na hora do relógio de destino.

trans-unit.source: This offset is relative to the clock's <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.BeginTime" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.Duration" />, depending on the value of <c>origin</c>.
trans-unit.target: Esse deslocamento é relativo ao <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.BeginTime" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.Duration" /> do relógio, dependendo do valor de <c>origin</c>.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the specified offset is relative to the target clock's <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.BeginTime" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se o deslocamento especificado em relação ao <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.BeginTime" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.Duration" /> do relógio do destino.

trans-unit.source: Seeks the target <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock" /> by the specified amount when the next tick occurs.
trans-unit.target: Procura o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock" /> de destino pelo valor especificado quando o próximo tique ocorre.

trans-unit.source: If the target clock is stopped, seeking makes it active again.
trans-unit.target: Se o relógio de destino for interrompido, realizar uma busca o ativará novamente.

trans-unit.source: Seek operations do not take the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings of this clock's timeline into account: the clock is treated as though its timeline has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Busca de operações não usem o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> configurações da linha de tempo do relógio, essa conta: o relógio será tratado como se o seu cronograma tiver um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> de 1 e não <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This method changes the clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Active>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método altera o relógio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Active>.

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: Este método não tem nenhum efeito na árvore de tempo até a próxima vez que um tique é processado.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events also will not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: Como um efeito colateral, os eventos adequados também não ocorrerá até lá.

trans-unit.source: Seeking a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Busca um gatilhos de storyboard a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the target clock has children, their current time is updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Se o relógio de destino tiver filhos, o tempo atual é atualizado adequadamente.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to seek using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como buscar usando um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.

trans-unit.source: The seek offset, measured in the target clock's time.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento de busca, medido na hora do relógio de destino.

trans-unit.source: This offset is relative to the clock's <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.BeginTime" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.Duration" />, depending on the value of <c>origin</c>.
trans-unit.target: Esse deslocamento é relativo ao <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.BeginTime" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.Duration" /> do relógio, dependendo do valor de <c>origin</c>.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the specified offset is relative to the target clock's <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.BeginTime" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se o deslocamento especificado em relação ao <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.BeginTime" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.Duration" /> do relógio do destino.

trans-unit.source: Seeks the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> by the specified amount immediately.
trans-unit.target: Procura o destino <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> pelo valor especificado imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: If the target clock is stopped, seeking makes it active again.
trans-unit.target: Se o relógio de destino for interrompido, realizar uma busca o ativará novamente.

trans-unit.source: Seek operations do not take the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings of this clock's timeline into account: the clock is treated as though its timeline has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Busca de operações não usem o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> configurações da linha de tempo do relógio, essa conta: o relógio será tratado como se o seu cronograma tiver um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> de 1 e não <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> aligns the seeked time of the clock with the last clock tick.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> Alinha o tempo buscado do relógio com a última escala de relógio.

trans-unit.source: Values are immediately updated to reflect the changes due to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A>, even though the screen will not reflect these changes until the screen updates.
trans-unit.target: Valores são imediatamente atualizados para refletir as alterações devido à <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A>, mesmo que a tela não refletirá as alterações até que as atualizações de tela.

trans-unit.source: If the target clock has children, their current time is updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Se o relógio de destino tiver filhos, o tempo atual é atualizado adequadamente.

trans-unit.source: This method changes the clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Active>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método altera o relógio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Active>.

trans-unit.source: Seeking a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Busca um gatilhos de storyboard a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates both the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Seek%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> methods of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra ambos o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Seek%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> métodos de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.

trans-unit.source: Advances the current time of the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> to the end of its active period.
trans-unit.target: Adianta a hora atual do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> de destino até o final do respectivo período ativo.

trans-unit.source: This method advances the target clock's current time to the end of its active period; the clock's behavior at this point is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> setting of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método avança o relógio do destino hora atual para o final do seu período ativo; comportamento do relógio neste ponto é especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> configuração de seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>.

trans-unit.source: If the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior.HoldEnd>, the clock fills; if the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior.Stop>, the clock stops.
trans-unit.target: Se a linha do tempo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior.HoldEnd>, preenche o relógio; se a propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior.Stop>, as paradas de relógio.

trans-unit.source: This method has an effect only if the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Active>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método tem somente-se um efeito o relógio de destino <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> é <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Active>.

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: Este método não tem nenhum efeito na árvore de tempo até a próxima vez que um tique é processado.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events also will not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: Como um efeito colateral, os eventos adequados também não ocorrerá até lá.

trans-unit.source: Advancing a storyboard to its fill period triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Aprimorando um storyboard a seu preenchimento gatilhos períodos o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interactive speed of the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a velocidade interativa do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: A finite value greater than zero that describes the interactive speed of the target clock.
trans-unit.target: Um valor finito maior que zero que descreve a velocidade interativa do relógio do destino.

trans-unit.source: This value is multiplied against the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio" /> of the clock's <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor é multiplicado em relação ao valor da <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio" /> do relógio do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the timeline's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio" /> is 0.5 and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController" /> object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SpeedRatio" /> is 3.0, the timeline moves at 1.5 times normal speed (0.5 * 3.0).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a linha do tempo <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio" /> é 0,5 e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController" /> do objeto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SpeedRatio" /> é 3.0, a linha do tempo move a velocidade normal de 1,5 vezes (0,5 * 3.0).

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect until the next tick.
trans-unit.target: A definição dessa propriedade não terá efeito até a próxima escala.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property and then get its value before the next tick occurs, you'll get the old value.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir essa propriedade e, em seguida, obter seu valor antes de Avançar escala ocorre, você obterá o valor antigo.

trans-unit.source: This property will return the new value after the next tick.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade retornará o novo valor após o próximo tick.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not change the value of the underlying timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A definição dessa propriedade não altera o valor da linha de tempo subjacente <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property triggers the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: A definição dessa propriedade dispara o relógio de destino <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Stops the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" />.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: This method changes the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método altera o relógio de destino <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> clock can be restarted by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Seek%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> relógio pode ser reiniciado usando a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Seek%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: Este método não tem nenhum efeito na árvore de tempo até a próxima vez que um tique é processado.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events also will not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: Como um efeito colateral, os eventos adequados também não ocorrerá até lá.

trans-unit.source: Stopping a clock triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: Parando gatilhos um relógio de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> eventos, mas não o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> evento.
